title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 52 - Diseases Of Domestic Animals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 52 - Diseases Of Domestic Animals

State Regulations
§ 52.1 - Access to domestic animal premises
§ 52.2 - Access to vehicles carrying domestic animals, feedstuffs or garbage
§ 52.3 - Disease control program; garbage feeding and hog cholera
§ 52.4 - Moving domestic animals which have been fed garbage
§ 52.5 to 52.11 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 52

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§16, 18, 72, 72-a, 76, 91

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
